statusText.perText: Higher CPU usage, Higher fan speed
statusText.quietText: Lower CPU usage, Lower fan speed

statusText.gamingText: CPU Overclocking will be activated automatically while game launches

popup.text: Change will be effective after restarting computer.

driverPopup.text: You need install driver for RAM Overclock to  make it effective

legionEdgeModal.line1:
With Vantage Edge, your settings will be automatically tuned based on usage. 
 Maximum performance when gaming, longer battery life when you're not.
legionEdgeModal.line2:
Feature Management Overview
Some features not available on all devices
legionEdgeModal.line3:
CPU Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your processor
legionEdgeModal.line4:
RAM Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your memory
legionEdgeModal.line5:
Network Boost
Prioritize network traffic for the game you're playing
legionEdgeModal.line6:
Dolby
Tune your audio specifically for gaming with Dolby technology
legionEdgeModal.line7:
Hybrid Mode
Disable advanced GPU settings when not gaming to boost battery performance
legionEdgeModal.line8:
Rapid Charge
Game on the go longer with quicker battery charging
legionEdgeModal.line9:
Touchpad Lock
Prevent mistaken inputs by disabling the touchpad while gaming
legionEdgeModal.line10:
Auto Close
Clear processes that are not needed for gaming before you start playing to maximize available system resources
legionEdgeModal.line11:
Thermal Mode
Set your preferred device profile for fan speed and cooling control

systemInfo.systenTooltip: Hover on CPU/GPU/RAM and different drives to show their descriptions including manufature and model info

macroKey.title: Macro Key
macroKey.introLine: You can record a series of key input, and use them in gaming or other operations.

whileGaming.title: Macro Key enabled only when gaming
whileGaming.description: It will be enabled when you game and remain as num key when you don't.

intro.title: CREATE A MACRO KEY FOR
intro.line1: click the start recording button below

recording.title: START TYPING
recording.description: 20 inputs with in 20 seconds can be recorded.

keep.title: Keep Delay
keep.description: Intervals of key actions will be kept and applied when using this macro key.

ignore.title: Ignore Delay
ignore.description: Intervals of key actions will be ignored.

clearMacrokey.title: Are you sure to clear this macro key?

timeoutRecording.title: Time Out For Recording.
timeoutRecording.body: Recording will time out if no input for 20 seconds.

maximumInput.title: Maximum Input Reached.
maximumInput.body: Macro key can only store inputs less than 20.

inputStopped.title: Time Out For Recording.
inputStopped.body: Recording will time out if the input stopped for more than 10 seconds.

securityAdvisor.title: Savetnik za bezb.
securityAdvisor.subtitle: PROVERITE DA LI JE UREĐAJ ZAŠTIĆEN.

tutorial.para1: Just a few more buttons to press before we can have liftoff.
tutorial.para2: Before we can give you the most optimal experience there are still a few things to setup.
tutorial.howMachinUsed: Click on one of these uses to tell is how you will use this machine?
tutorial.howOnesMachinUsed: Click on one of these uses to tell is how you will use this machine?

offlineInfo.title: No internet connection detected
offlineInfo.subtitle: Learn more on how to solve connection issues in our

feedback.title: Give Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Tell us what you think about vantage.

systemStatus.title: System Status
systemStatus.subtitle: QUICK CATCH UP YOUR DEVICE STATUS.

Illegal.title: This system may not support battery that
Illegal.description: is not genuine Lenovo-made or authorized. The system will continue to boot, but may not charge with unauthorized batteries.
Illegal.description2: Lenovo has no responsibility for the performance or safety of unauthorized batteries, and provides no warranties for failures or damage arising out of their use.

Good.title: The battery is in good Condition

Exhaustion.title: The battery has failed due to normal
Exhaustion.description: wear. The battery cannot be charged. Replace the battery.

Bad.title: A battery error has occurred.
Bad.description: The battery cannot be charged/discharged . Replace the battery.

NotGood.title: The battery is not in a good Condition

ACAdapterNotSupported.title: AC adapter not supported.
ACAdapterNotSupported.description: Your Lenovo computer doesn't support this AC adapter. It may cause sudden shutdown.Please connect a correct AC adapter

EnoughPowerACAdapter.title: AC adapter cannot provide enough power
EnoughPowerACAdapter.description: to your Lenovo computer that will impact system performance and charging speed. Please reconnect the proper AC adapter.

MissingDriver.title: The Lenovo Power Manager Driver is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver
MissingDriver.description: is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver

power.title: Napajanje
power.subtitle: Postavke napajanja
power.description: Ovaj odeljak vam omogućava da dinamički podesite termalne performanse i da povećate vek trajanja baterije.Ima i drugih popularnih funkcija vezanih za napajanje. U ovom odeljku možete da proverite podrazumevane postavke i da prilagodite sistem prema svojim potrebama.

powerSmartSettings.title: Pametne postavke napajanja
powerSmartSettings.subtitle: INTELIGENTNO HLAĐENJE
powerSmartSettings.description1: Ova funkcija dinamički podešava toplotne postavke vašim potrebama.
powerSmartSettings.description2: Pametno hlađenje prilagođava brzinu ventilatora, maksimalnu temperaturu površine računara i performanse.Ova funkcija ima režime navedene u nastavku i sada je dostupna na klizaču za performanse napajanja operativnog sistema Windows.
powerSmartSettings.description3: Pametno hlađenje automatski usklađuje toplotne performanse da se prilagode vašim potrebama.Funkcija pametnog hlađenja prilagođava postavke performansi da bi pružila hladniju površinu radi prijatnog korišćenja kada držite prenosivi računar.

gotoWindows.title: Idite na Windows postavke
gotoWindows.modalBodyText1: Kliknite na ikonu baterije Windows na sistemskoj paleti za pristup klizaču za performanse napajanja sistema Windows

intelligentCooling.title: Pametno hlađenje
intelligentCooling.apsHint: Da biste omogućili pametno hlađenje, morate instalirati i omogućiti Lenovo Active Protection System.

readMore.line2: Klizač je na sredini.Brzina i performanse ventilatora su dinamički izbalansirane radi najboljeg doživljaja.
readMore.line3: Klizač je sasvim desno. Brzina ventilatora i dozvoljena temperatura površine više su radi najviših performansi.

selectedModeText.quiteCool: This mode enables the best experience with fan speed and system performance balanced. For example, when in gaming, it optimizes the performance. While in the office, it reduces the noise.
selectedModeText.batterySaving: This mode enables the maximum battery life by automatically adjusting the brightness, changing the power settings, disabling features on advanced image processing, etc.
selectedModeText.performance: This mode enables the maximum system performance. In this mode, the fast fan speed might cause big noise.

powerSmartSettings.description14: This feature enables you to adjust your fan speed, maximize the system performance, or extend your battery life if needed. It has three modes below. You also can switch the modes using hotkeys (Fn+Q) or from Lenovo Vantage Toolbar.

alwaysUSB.title: Uvek na USB
alwaysUSB.description: Punjenje USB uređaja preko konektora Uvek na USB na računaru, kada je računar u režimu spavanja, hibernacije ili kada je isključen.Pametni telefon ili tablet može biti napunjen brzo preko USB konektora koji je obeležen žutom bojom ili ovim ikonama odštampanim sito štampom:
alwaysUSB.checkbox: Omogući USB punjenje sa baterije laptop računara kada je računar isključen.

easyResume.title: Easy Resume
easyResume.description: Enable this feature to improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer's lid.
easyResume.tooltip: This feature will improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer’s lid. When enabled, your computer will enter a low power mode when you close its lid, but it will resume instantly if you reopen your lid within 15 minutes of closing it. This feature also allows your notebook to attempt to finish pending activities (such as sending email or downloading a file) before the system goes into suspend.

vantageToolbar.title: Traka sa alatkama aplikacije Lenovo Vantage
vantageToolbar.description: Zakačite traku sa alatkama aplikacije Vantage na Windows traku zadataka da biste lako dobili više detalja o bateriji i pristup brzim postavkama.

batteryThreshold.title: Prag punjenja baterije
batteryThreshold.description: Ako prvenstveno koristite računar sa prikačenim adapterom za naizmeničnu struju i samo povremeno koristite napajanje iz baterije,možete da produžite životni vek baterije podešavanjem maksimalne vrednosti napunjenosti ispod 100%. Ovo je korisno zato što baterije koje se samo povremeno koriste imaju duži životni vek kada se održavaju na manjoj vrednosti od potpunog punjenja.
batteryThreshold.tooltip: Ako je baterija trenutno napunjena iznad praga zaustavljanja punjenja, odvojite napajanje dok baterija se ne isprazni do ili ispod praga zaustavljanja punjenja.
batteryThreshold.noteInfo: Battery Charge Threshold is still not fully active. Please unplug your machine and allow your battery to drain to or below the stop-charging threshold.

popup.title: Omogući prag punjenja baterije
popup.description1: Omogućavanje prilagođenoj punjenja baterija omogućiće da opšte zdravlje baterije duže traje dok koristite ovaj uređaj.
popup.description2: Da biste u potpunosti omogućili ovu funkciju, isključite mašinu iomogućite da se baterija isprazni ili da bude ispod praga za prestanak punjenja.

options.checkboxText: Automatically set the start charging threshold 5 percentage points below the stop charging threshold.

expressCharging.title: Ekspresno punjenje
expressCharging.description: Ekspresno punjenje omogućava da se baterija puni mnogo brže nego normalni režim.
expressCharging.tooltip: Ekspresno punjenje vam omogućava da napunite sistemsku bateriju mnogo brže,ali to može da smanji trajanje baterije.

conservationMode.title: Režim uštede
conservationMode.description: Ova funkcija je korisna za produžavanje trajanja baterije kada je priključena na struju.

tooltip.line1: Ova funkcija je korisna za produžavanje trajanja baterije kada je priključena na struju.
tooltip.line2: Kada je ovaj režim omogućen, baterija će se puniti samo do kapaciteta od 55-60% a životni vek baterije se može maksimalno povećati.
tooltip.line3: Napomena: Ekspresno punjenje i konzervacija ne mogu da rade istovremeno.

airPlanePower.title: Režim korišćenja u avionu
airPlanePower.description: Zaštitite utičnicu za napajanje naizmeničnom strujom u avionu kontrolom potrošnje vašeg sistema.

audio.title: Audio
audio.subtitle: Audio postavke
audio.description: Ovaj odeljak vam omogućava da ručno optimizujete ili potpuno

audioSmartsettings.title: Pametne audio postavke
audioSmartsettings.subtitle: POSTAVKE ZASNOVANE NA APLIKACIJI
audioSmartsettings.description: Automatski prilagodite audio postavke u skladu sa različitim aplikacijama koje koristite.

dolby.title: Automatske Dolby audio postavke
dolby.tooltip: Automatske Dolby audio postavke konfigurišu Dolby audio postavke uodgovarajućem režimu za različite aplikacije koje koristite za poboljšavanje utiska pri radu sa zvukom.

voip.title: Automatska optimizacija zvuka za VoIP
voip.tooltip: Automatski se prebacuje u Dolby Voice režim tokom VoIP poziva kako biste dobili čist i konzistentan kvalitet glasa.

note.title: napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage nema dozvolu da pristupi mikrofonu.Dozvolite aplikaciji Lenovo Vantage da pristupi mikrofonu.

microphone.title: Mikrofon
microphone.tooltip: Možete prilagoditi MIC efekat podešavanjem jačine zvuka mikrofonai navesti odgovarajući režim.

volume.title: Microphone Volume
volume.description: Dolby Audio delivers rich, clear, powerful sound from all the content you enjoy, select appropriate mode for your content and equipment.

suppress.title: Suppress keyboard noise
suppress.tooltip: Toggle this on to optimize the MIC audio by suppressing keyboard noise.

acoustic.title: Acoustic Echo Cancellation
acoustic.tooltip: Toggle on this feature to optimize your MIC audio by reducing acoustic echo.

optimize.title: Optimize my microphone for:
optimize.tooltip: Configure microphone effect to enhance your audio experience by different scenarios and environment.

displayCamera.title: Ekran i kamera
displayCamera.subtitle: Ekran i postavke kamere
displayCamera.description: Ovaj odeljak vam omogućava da poboljšate vizuelni doživljaj i konfigurišete svojstva kamere.Istražite više funkcija i prilagodite svoje iskustvo prikaza ovde.

eyeCareMode.title: Režim za zaštitu vida
eyeCareMode.checkbox: Zakažite režim za zaštitu vida od zalaska do izlaska sunca
eyeCareMode.tooltip: Režim za zaštitu vida prilagođava temperaturu boja ekrana kako bi se isfiltriralo plavo svetlo i smanjilo naprezanje očiju.
eyeCareMode.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Zakažite režim za zaštitu vida od zalaska do izlaska sunca

note.title: Napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage treba da pristupi informacijama o lokaciji kako bi se izračunalo vreme zalaska i izlaska sunca u vašem regionu.

dispColorTemp.title: Daytime color temperature
dispColorTemp.tooltip: Eye Care Mode adjusts the color temperature of your display to filter out blue light and reduce eye strain.
dispColorTemp.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Schedule eye care mode from sunset to sunrise

note.title: Note
note.description: When the Eye care mode is enabled. this color temperature does not take effect. However,  you can drag the slide to get a preview of it. To make it effective. turn off the Eye care mode

privacyGuard.title: Privacy guard
privacyGuard.description: This feature prevents other people from peeking at your screen. When on, it changes the viewing angle of your display, keeping it private from those around you. You also can toggle modes by pressing the "Fn+D" keys.
privacyGuard.note: Privacy Guard does not work in screen portrait mode. In this mode, your screen is still visible from the sides.
privacyGuard.labelText: Enable this feature when typing passwords

oledPowerSettings.title: OLED Power Settings
description: Your computer's OLED display can also reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.
It is also recommended to dim the task bar and other areas of the display that do not change frequently to prolong the overall lifetime of the display.
oledPowerSettings.tooltip: This feature can reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.

camera.title: Kamera

note.title: Napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage nema dozvole da pristupi vašoj kameri.Dozvolite aplikaciji Lenovo Vantage da pristupi kameri.

camera.url: Idite na postavke zaštite privatnosti sistema Windows

cameraPrivacy.title: Režim za privatnost prilikom korišćenja kamere
cameraPrivacy.tooltip: Kamera prestaje da šalje slike uživo kada se omoguće postavke zaštite privatnosti. Uključite ove postavke samo kada ne želite da delite svoje slike sa drugima tokom video poziva.

camera.title: Kamera
camera.tooltip: Kliknite ovde da biste svojstva kamere vratili na podrazumevane vrednosti.

camerablur.title: Zamagljenje pozadine za kameru
camerablur.caption: Ova funkcija zamagljuje pozadinu kada koristite kameru za video poziv ili fotografisanje.Možete da odaberete drugačije efekte iz izbora u nastavku.

smartAssist.title: Smart Assist
smartAssist.description: Lenovo inteligentno raspoznavanje kombinuje različite senzore na računaru kako bi se otkrile vaše aktivnosti,prilagodile postavke za optimalno upravljanje napajanjem i zaštitila vaša privatnost.

HumanPresenceDetection.title: Detekcija ljudskih prisustva
HumanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Kliknite ovde da biste uspostavili početne vrednosti postavki za otkrivanje ljudskih prisustva.

humanPresenceDetection.title: User Presence Sensing
humanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Click here to reset human presence Detection settings.

zeroTouchLogin.title: Zero Touch prijavljivanje
zeroTouchLogin.caption: Ova funkcija automatski otključava ili budi računar kada ste ispred njega ili mu prilazite.

zeroTouchLock.title: Zero Touch zaključavanje
zeroTouchLock.caption: Ova funkcija zatamnjuje ekran i zaključava računar kada se ne otkrije prisustvo korisnika.To može smanjiti šanse neovlašćenog pristupa računaru kada ostavite računar otključan i bez nadzora.

autoScreenLockTimer.title: TAJMER AUTOMATSKOG ZAKLJUČAVANJA EKRANA
autoScreenLockTimer.toolTipContent: Izaberite željenu opciju da biste zaključali ekran Brzom/Srednjom/Sporom brzinom kada vaše prisustvo nije otkriveno.

distanceSensitivityAdjusting.title: DISTANCE SENSITIVITY ADJUSTING
distanceSensitivityAdjusting.caption: Automatsko podešavanje razdaljine će automatski ažuriratirastojanje za detekciju putem mehanizma veštačke inteligencije.

note.description1: Ova funkcija se oslanja na sistem Windows Hello.Uverite se da je prepoznavanje lica uključeno u postavkama operativnog sistema Windows.
note.description2: Funkcija koristi senzore i kameru da bi otkrila vaše prisustvo.
note.description3: 1. Ako je računar u režimima šatora, tableta ili postolja,ove funkcije možda neće raditi ispravno.
note.description4: 2. Ako je računar u režimu hibernacije ili je isključen.Automatsko prijavljivanje putem IC kamere neće funkcionisati.
note.description5: 3. Podesite ekran računara na odgovarajući ugaokako bi IC kamera mogla da prepozna vaše lice za automatsko prijavljivanje.

WindowsLink.goToWindowsHello: Idite na postavke sistema Windows Hello
WindowsLink.screenTimeoutSettings: Idite na postavke vremena čekanja za ekran

intelligentScreen.title: Intelligent Screen
intelligentScreen.description: Lenovo Intelligent Sensing combines the various sensors on your computer to detect your activities and adjust settings for power management. For example, it will dim your display if it detects you are walking but will not dim it if it detects you reading.

autoScreenOff.title: Auto screen off
autoScreenOff.caption: Automatically turn off display when face-down or walking.
autoScreenOff.note: This feature is not available if your Power Plan settings are set to "never turn off the screen on battery " in the Windows Settings "System section". Please select a value other than "Never" to enable this feature.
autoScreenOff.windowsLink: Go to Power & sleep settings in Windows settings

keepMyDisplay.title: Keep my display
keepMyDisplay.caption: Keep my display when I am reading or browsing.

displaySlider.title: Minutes Before display dims when browsing

intelligentMedia.heading: Intelligent Media
intelligentMedia.title: Zero Touch Video Playback
intelligentMedia.desc: This feature will pause the video when you are leaving the computer and resume the video when you are back.
intelligentMedia.tooltip: This feature is not applicable to Web video players. Popular local video players, such as Windows Media Player, 5KPlayer, and etc. support this feature.

popup.rebootForceMsg: Ažuriranja koje ste izabrali će dovesti do automatskog ponovnog pokretanja sistema nakon instalacije.
popup.shutdownForceMsg: Ažuriranja koje ste izabrali će dovesti do automatskog isključivanja nakon instalacije.
popup.rebootDelayedMsg: Zbog ažuriranja koja ste izabrali, sistem će ponovo da se pokrene nakon instalacije. Tokom instalacije ažuriranja, nemojte da isključujete sistem, vadite izvor napajanja ili pribor. Preporučujemo vam da kao pripremu za ponovno pokretanje sistema sačuvate posao.
popup.rebootRequiredMsg: Da biste uspešno instalirali ažuriranja, potrebno je ponovo pokrenuti računar kako biste osigurali da sve radi besprekorno i bezbedno.

critical.title: Kritična ažuriranja
critical.tooltip: Kritična ažuriranja mogu da spreče značajan problem, velike kvarove, greške u hardveru ili oštećenje podataka.

recommended.title: Preporučena ažuriranja
recommended.tooltip: Preporučena ažuriranja upravljačkog programa održavaju rad računara sa optimalnim performansama.

banner.title: Ažuran sistem je zdrav sistem.
banner.description: Ovi paketi obuhvataju ispravke za upravljačke programe hardvera i druge sistemske uslužne programe koji su od kritične važnosti za pravilan rad računara. Ispravke od kritične važnosti su važne i za zaštitu podataka na računaru i moraju se instalirati čim postanu dostupne. Ako ne instalirate ove pakete, može doći do gubitka podataka, poremećaja u funkcionisanju sistema ili do kvara hardvera.

fail.title: Neka ažuriranja nisu ispravno instalirana.
fail.description: Nešto je krenulo naopako tokom preuzimanja ili instalacije ovih ažuriranja.Uverite se da ste na mreži i ne isključujte računar kada instalirate ažuriranja.

updateCheckbox.failReason: Razlog neuspeha: Adapter za napajanje računara naizmeničnom strujom nije povezan sa računarom.
updateCheckbox.rebootDelayTag: Potrebno je ponovno pokretanje, potreban je izvor napajanja

availableUpdates.title: Dostupna ažuriranja
availableUpdates.description: Ovi paketi obuhvataju ažuriranja koja su kritična za ispravan rad vašeg računara. Kritična ažuriranja pomažu da vaš računar bude bezbedniji i pouzdaniji i trebalo bi ih instalirati čim budu dostupna. Preporučena i opciona ažuriranja vam pomažu da softver ostane ažuran i da računar radi na najbolji mogući način.
availableUpdates.installFailDescription: Nešto je krenulo naopako tokom preuzimanja i instalacije ovih ažuriranja. Uverite se da ste na mreži i ne isključujte računar tokom instaliranja ažuriranja.

homeSecurity.title: Connected Home Security
homeSecurity.trialExpiredSubtext: Upgrate to protect all of your devices

tour.welcomeDesc1: In just a few clicks you’ll be able to protect PCs, mobile devices, and connected devices for you and your family. Start your free 30 day trial now.
tour.welcomeDesc2: Connected Home Security is built directly in to Vantage for quick access to the protection status of your ecosystem and security alerts.
tour.monitor: Monitor the safety of your family's devices
tour.peaceOfMind: Get peace of mind that you are protected at all times!
tour.alreadyHave: I already have a Connected Home Security Account
tour.locationPermission: In order for this feature to function correctly you will need to enable location tracking for this device

warranty.subDescription1: Ovaj proizvod ima godišnje ograničenu garanciju i ima pravo na uslugu popravke u servisu. Korisnici mogu nazvati svoj lokalni servisni centar za više informacija. Prodavci mogu da pruže uslugu popravke za ovaj proizvod ako ga prime u svojim prostorijama.
warranty.subDescription2: Nismo uspeli da lociramo detalje garancije za vaš uređaj. Za više opcija garancije posetite našu veb lokaciju za podršku.

needHelp.title: Potrebna vam je pomoć?
needHelp.description: KONTAKTIRAJTE NAS DA BISMO VAM POMOGLI.
needHelp.weChatDescription: Pošaljite nam pitanje na WeChat i budite sigurni da ćemo vam brzo odgovoriti

quicklinks.title: Brze veze
quicklinks.description: KONTAKTIRAJTE NAS DA BISMO VAM POMOGLI.

quickAccess.categoriesDesc: Pronađite korisne informacije u našim člancima.

landing.notFullyDesc: Niste u potpunosti zaštićeni. Saznajte kako da se bolje zaštitite.
landing.maliciousNetwork: Vaš računar je ovog meseca sprečen pri priključivanju {{maliciousWifi}} zlonamernim mrežama.
landing.subTitleOffline: Learn more on how to solve connection issues in our

common.title: Antivirusni program
common.recommends: Lenovo preporučuje McAfee za zaštitu svih uređaja sa:
common.award: Nagrađenom zaštitom od najnovijih pretnji na mreži, softvera za ucenjivanje i malvera
common.dedicated: Specijalizovanim bezbednosnim alatom koji uvek nadmašuje Defender i druge vodeće proizvođače antivirusnih softvera
common.deviceToCloud: Tehnologijom koja štiti sve od uređaja do oblaka i ne usporava računar
common.privacyTerms: Pročitajte više o <tag>Politici privatnosti</tag> i <tag>Uslovima korišćenja usluge</tag>
common.protectedBy: Trenutno vas štiti {{protectedName}}. Međutim, možete da budete bolje zaštićeni pomoću usluge McAfee LiveSafe.

windowsDefender.subtitle: Trenutno vas štiti Windows Defender.Međutim, mogli biste da budete bolje zaštićeni pomoću programa McAfee LiveSafe. Saznajte više u nastavku.
windowsDefender.windowsProtected: Osnovna zaštita s pomoću programa Windows Defender
windowsDefender.windowsSubtitle: Windows Defender pruža osnovnu zaštitu za vaš uređaj

mcafee.title: McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.subtitle: Trenutno vas štiti McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.awardSubtitle: Blokira viruse, malver, softver za ucenjivanje, špijunski softver, neželjeni program i još mnogo toga na računaru.
mcafee.encryptedSubtitle: Neka osetljive datoteke ostanu privatne tako što ćete ih skladištiti na računaru sa 128-bitnim šifrovanjem.
mcafee.identitySubtitle: Preuzmite odgovornost za zaštitu identiteta od krađe i prevare.
mcafee.supportSubtitle: Pokriveni ste telefonom, ćaskanjem ili na mreži tokom važenja vaše pretplate.
mcafee.antiSubtitle: Blokira opasne poruke pre nego što stignu do prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta uklanjanjem e-poruka koje možda sadrže rizične veze i viruse.
mcafee.virusSubtitle: Pruža vam uverenje da će u slučaju da vaš računar dobije virus, stručnjak kompanije McAfee daljinski pristupiti vašem računaru da ga ukloni.
mcafee.parentalSubtitle: Blokirajte veb lokacije i rezultate pretrage koje ne želite da vaša deca vide. Takođe vam omogućava da postavite ograničenja koliko vremena provode na mreži.

others.othersProtection: pruža osnovnu zaštitu za vaš uređaj

container.title: Lenovo WiFi bezbednost
container.name: WIFI BEZBEDNOST
container.disableDecribe: Lenovo WiFi bezbednost je napredna softverska usluga zasnovana na oblaku koja pomaže vašem uređaju da razlikuje bezbedne bežične mreže od potencijalno zlonamernih.

threatlocator.describe: Koristite detektor pretnji za utvrđivanje bezbednosti mreža oko vas.
threatlocator.tryAgain: Ne možemo da lociramo pretnju po vas zato što mreža nije dostupna, povežite se sa internetom i pokušajte ponovo.

locationmodal.title: Omogućite usluge određivanja lokacije
locationmodal.describe1: Da biste koristili Lenovo WiFi bezbednost, morate da omogućite usluge za određivanje lokacije za Lenovo Vantage. Želite li da odmah omogućite lokaciju?
locationmodal.describe2: Da biste koristili povezanu kućnu bezbednost, morate da omogućite usluge za određivanje lokacije za Lenovo Vantage. Želite li da odmah omogućite lokaciju?

homesecurity.title: Povezana kućna bezbednost
homesecurity.titleDescription: Povezana kućna bezbednost čuva vas na tri načina:
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect1: Povezana kućna bezbednost osigurava da uređaj bude bezbedan i da nije ugrožen
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect2: Povezana kućna bezbednost osigurava da mreže sa kojima ste povezani budu bezbedne
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect3: Povezana kućna bezbednost osigurava da drugi uređaji sa kojima ste povezani budu bezbedni.
homesecurity.describe: Uređaji i mreže koji nisu bezbedni mogu uvesti malver, dovesti do krađe identiteta i curenja privatnih i finansijskih informacija. Omogućite ovu funkciju da biste umanjili rizik od izlaganja računara i kućne mreže napadačima
homesecurity.subtitle: Postizanje sigurnosti
homesecurity.subtitleDescribe: Povezana kućna bezbednost će vam poslati obaveštenje ako otkrije ranjivost u uređaju ili kućnoj mreži ili ako ste povezani sa potencijalno zlonamernom mrežom. Saznajte još više o povezanoj kućnoj bezbednosti u <tag>ovde</tag>.

invitationcode.buttonDescribe: Ovaj ste uređaj već priključili na postojeći nalog za povezanu kućnu bezbednost.
invitationcode.title: Već imate povezanu kućnu bezbednost?
invitationcode.titleDescribe: Proverite da li su dozvole za lokaciju omogućene za Vantage kako biste uređaj dodali na postojeći nalog kućne povezanosti i koristili povezanu kućnu bezbednost.
invitationcode.canUse: Sada možete početi da koristite povezanu kućnu bezbednost

vpn.title: Bezbednost VPN mreže
vpn.whatIsSufEasy: SurfEasy VPN šifruje informacije koje šaljete i primate tako da možete bezbedno i privatno koristiti svoj lični računar, Mac®, pametni telefon ili tablet na bilo kojoj Internet vezi bez brige.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy1: A virtual private network provider that protects you while you are online. Without a VPN, your computer may be more vulnerable to attackers and identity theft. The VPN runs silently in the background and provides security and privacy protection.
vpn.startUseSufEasy4: SurfEasy users can enjoy 250 MB of free traffic every 30 days! Follow the steps on the "Rewards" tab of the SurfEasy app to get more traffic.
vpn.howToGetData1: Confirm email to win +250 MB traffic
vpn.howToGetData2: Add a second device to win +250 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData3: Refer a friend and win +500 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData4: Like SurfEasy on Facebook, earn +100 MB of traffic,
vpn.howToGetData5: Follow SurfEasy on Twitter and win +100 MB of traffic
vpn.helpKeep: Pomoću SurfEasy VPN mreže čuvajte sigurnost i privatnost vaših aktivnosti na internetu.
vpn.whySufEasyDescription: Korišćenje Wi-Fi pristupnih tačaka, poput onih u kafiću ili aerodromima, moglo bi da izloži vaše osetljive informacije sajber kriminalcima. SurfEasy VPN je VPN mreža bez prijavljivanja koja šifruje vaše lične podatke i ne prati niti skladišti vašu aktivnost na mreži ili lokaciju.
vpn.startUseSufEasy: Počnite da koristite SurfEasy već danas
vpn.startUseSufEasy1: Uverite se da su podaci koje šaljete i primate bezbedni i privatni sa šifrovanjem bankovnog nivoa.
vpn.startUseSufEasy2: Sprečite kompanije da prate vaše aktivnosti na mreži ili lokaciju.
vpn.startUseSufEasy3: Besplatne i ekskluzivne ponude pružaju više opcija koje odgovaraju vašim potrebama i budžetu.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy2: Zaštitite svoju privatnost i uključite SurfEasy VPN kada pristupate javnoj Wi-Fi pristupnoj tački. S planom Lenovo Starter VPN možete ispuniti nagradne aktivnosti da biste zaradili veći propusni opseg zaštite podataka. Nadogradite da biste zaštitili do 5 pametnih telefona, tableta i računara sa neograničenim propusnim opsegom.
vpn.getStarted1: Kliknite iznad na dugme „Otvori SurfEasy“ da biste pokrenuli SurfEasy VPN.
vpn.getStarted2: Uključite VPN i pričekajte trenutak za potvrdu bezbedne veze.
vpn.getStarted3: Promenite region ili lokaciju ako želite i uživajte u bezbednom, privatnom umrežavanju.
vpn.privacyPolicyAndTermsOfService: Pročitajte više o <tag>Politici privatnosti</tag> i <tag>Uslovima korišćenja usluge</tag>

passwordManager.title: Ispravnost lozinke
passwordManager.whatIsPmNotInstalled: Najbezbedniji, najlakši način za čuvanje jakih, složenih lozinki i trenutno prijavljivanje na svaku lokaciju.
passwordManager.whatIsPmInstalled: Bezbedniji digitalni život čeka: dodavanje lozinki, omogućavanje nadzora mračnog interneta i automatsko popunjavanje informacija o plaćanju.
passwordManager.startProtect: Počnite da štitite svoje naloge na mreži na jednostavan način.
passwordManager.discount: Lenovo korisnici ekskluzivno koriste 50% popusta zaštite Dashlane tokom.
passwordManager.offer: Ponuda je dostupna samo za korisnike programa Dashlane!
passwordManager.learnMoreAbout: <tag>Saznajte više</tag> o tome kako u potpunosti da iskoristite Dashlane
passwordManager.neverForget: Dashlane: nikada više ne zaboravite lozinku
passwordManager.whatIsDashLane: Dashlane je upravljač lozinkama i aplikacija za digitalnu zaštitu koja radi uz vaš pregledač. Automatski čuva lozinke i lične podatke, pamti sve za vas i sve bezbedno skladišti. Dashlane analizira i bezbednost naloga i obezbeđuje jednostavne načine za poboljšavanje ispravnosti lozinke.
passwordManager.helpYou1: Zapamtite neograničen broj korisničkih imena i lozinki.
passwordManager.helpYou2: Odmah se prijavite svuda za nesmetano pregledanje
passwordManager.helpYou3: Sinhronizujete uređaje tako da nikada niste bez pristupa važnim nalozima
passwordManager.helpYou4: Poboljšavate zaštitu na mreži pomoću jednostavnih, efikasnih saveta
passwordManager.checkOutThisGuide: Koristite Dashlane da biste bili bezbedni na mreži štedeći vreme i sebe štedeći od nervoze. Za detaljna uputstva o tome kako da napravite prve korake, <tag>pogledajte ovo uputstvo.</tag>

passwordManager.allowsYou2: Pratite postoje li vaše lične informacije na mračnom internetu
passwordManager.allowsYou3: Budite bezbedni na nebezbednim WiFi mrežama sa ugrađenim VPN-om

windowsHello.signIn: Prijavite se brzo i bezbedno uz Windows Hello.
windowsHello.signInTitle: Prijavite se brzo i bezbedno uz Windows Hello
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription1: Windows Hello omogućava lakše i bezbednije prijavljivanje na računar i može se koristiti i za Microsoft aplikacije na mreži. Pratite dolenavedena uputstva da biste počeli da koristite Windows Hello.

windowsHello.visitAndRegister: Posetite stranicu Windows Hello i registrujete otisak prsta.
windowsHello.visitInSettings: <tag> Posetite Windows Hello</tag> u sistemskim podešavanjima
windowsHello.unlock: Koristite Windows Hello da se prijavite i otključate računar dodirom prsta na senzor.
windowsHello.startUsingWindowsHello: Počnite da koristite Windows Hello da biste se prijavili u Microsoft aplikacije kao što su Outlook, OneDrive, Office 365 i Xbox Live.
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription2: Windows Hello čini vaše prijavljivanje računar lakšim i bezbednijim. Možete ga takođe koristiti i za Microsoft aplikacije na mreži. Pratite dolenavedena uputstva da biste počeli da koristite Windows Hello
windowsHello.traditional: Tradicionalne lozinke se mogu ukrasti i koristiti za pristup vašem nalogu iz bilo kog mesta u svetu. Bezbedniji i praktičniji. Windows Hello je sledeća generacija lozinki. Koristite čitač otisaka prstiju umesto prijavljivanja pomoću lozinke.

question1.title: Back up and restore your files
question1.description:
Back up and restore your files
It's always good to have a backup. Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.
Set up your backup
Select the Start button, select Settings > Update & security > Backup > Add a drive , and then choose an external drive or network location for your backups.
All set. Every hour, we'll back up everything in your user folder (C:\Users\username). To change which files get backed up or how often backups happen, go to More options.
Restore your files
If you're missing an important file or folder, here's how to get it back:
1. Type Restore files in the search box on the taskbar, and then select Restore your files with File History.
2. Look for the file you need, then use the arrows to see all its versions
3. When you find the version you want, select Restore to save it in its original location. To save it in a different place, press and hold (or right-click) Restore, select Restore to, and then choose a new location.

para1.line2: Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.

para3.span2: Every hour, we'll back up everything in your user folder (C:\Users\username).

question2.title: How to refresh your PC
question2.description:
How to refresh your PC
Symptom
If your PC isn't performing as well as it once did, and you don't know why, you can refresh your PC without deleting any of your personal files or changing your settings. Windows can “refresh” your PC so it’s more like a fresh install without deleting your personal files.
Refresh your PC, Here is what will happen: your files and personalized settings won’t change
  • Your PC settings will be changed back to its defaults
  • Apps from windows store will be kept
  • Apps you installed from disc or website will be removed
  • A list of removed files will be saved on your desktop
Affected Brands
  • All Desktop and Laptops
Operation System
  • Windows 8, 8.1 & 10
Solution
  • Windows 8/8.1
    1. Tap or click Settings
    2. Tap or click Update and recovery
    3. Tap or click Recovery
      Under Refresh your PC without affecting your files, tap or click Get started.
    4. Click 'Next'.
    5. Click 'Refresh' to start the refresh process.
    6. Once the refresh process is done, you can find a Removed Apps list on the desktop
    7. You can find the removed apps while refreshing your system
  • Windows 10
    1. Search for refresh in the search tool available in the Start menu,
    2. Click on 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' in the search results as shown below.
    3. Click on the Get started button just below the heading 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' to start refreshing your Windows 10 PC.
Additional Information
In most cases, once you start to refresh your PC, it’ll finish on its own. However, if Windows needs missing files, you’ll be asked to insert recovery media, which is typically a DVD disc or thumb drive. If that happens, what you’ll need depends on your PC.
If you upgraded your PC to Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 with a DVD, use that disc. If you don’t have Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 media, contact Microsoft Support.

question3.title: How to know your machine's CPU
question3.description:
How to know your machine's CPU

Symptom

The terms 32-bit and 64-bit refer to the way a computer's processor (also called a CPU), handles information. The 64-bit version of Windows handles large amounts of random access memory (RAM) more effectively than a 32-bit system.

Affected Brands

The above symptom is associated with, but not limited to, the following systems:

  • All Desktop and Laptops

Operating System

  • Windows 7 , 8 , 10

Solution

Windows 7 or Vista

  1. Open System by clicking the Start button Picture of the Start button, right-clicking Computer, and then clicking Properties
  2. Under System, you can view the system type.

Windows 8 and Windows 10

Method 1: View the System window in Control Panel

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. Type system in the search box, and then tap or click Settings.
  3. Tap or click System
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, 64-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading. If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, 32-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading.

Method 2: View the System Information window

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. In the search box, type system information
  3. Tap or click System, tap or click System Information, and then click System Summary.
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, x64-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

    If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, x86-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

question4.title: Check your machine's battery use
question4.description:
Check your machine's battery use

Symptom

Windows 10 includes a new “Battery Use” screen that shows you what’s draining your laptop’s juice. That means it’ll tell you exactly what apps–both desktop and Windows 10 “universal” apps–are using too much power.

Affected Brands

  • Lenovo laptops, desktops

Affected Systems

  • All

Operationg System

  • Window 10

Solution

This feature is new in Windows 10, we need to find this feature first as it is not stored in your traditional control panel view, this feature is located in the new “Settings” app


A. Find the Battery Use Screen

1. Click or Tap the “Settings” option from the start menu

2. In Settings select “System”and then select “Battery saver.”

3. Click or tap the “Battery use” link under this heading to see more details.

B. Analyze Your Power Usage

4 You can change to make the battery use screen to display battery use from last 24 hours to last 48 hours or last from last week

5 “System,” “Display,” and “ Wi-Fi” percentages. This shows how much battery power has been used by system processes, the display,

6 The “In use” and “Background” options show how much power is used by applications while you’re using them, compared to applications running in the background.

7 If apps are using power in the background, you can click or tap the “Change background app settings” link and configure apps to not run in the background. This only works for universal Windows 10 apps.

8 Scroll down further and you will see a list of applications, this is considered as the most useful section of this feature. It will display a list of the apps have used battery power in that period, and show you what percentage of your battery power each app has used

question5.title: Use your PC like a tablet
question5.description:
Use your PC like a tablet

Tablet mode makes Windows more intuitive and easier to use when you have a touchscreen device.

Use tablet mode

To turn on tablet mode, select action center on the taskbar, then select Tablet mode .

Note

To find out if your device can automatically turn on tablet mode, search for your device on the manufacturer's website. Support for this feature depends on the hardware, the driver that's installed, and how the device was set up by the manufacturer.

In tablet mode, apps open full screen, giving you more space to work. To close an app, drag it to the bottom of the screen.

Tip

The taskbar is available when your PC is in tablet mode, but you can hide it if you want more room on the screen. Select the Start button, select Settings > System > Tablet mode , then turn on Automatically hide the taskbar in tablet mode. To see the hidden taskbar, swipe up from the bottom of the screen, or use your mouse to hover there.

Use two apps simultaneously

To use two apps side by side in tablet mode, drag an open app down and to the side. You'll see where it'll snap, and you'll see any open apps next to it.

In this view, you can also:

  • Use the shared edge between two snapped apps to resize both apps at the same time.
  • Open a new app from task view—select Task view on the taskbar, select an app, then drag it to one side to snap it into your divided screen.
  • Use the back button on the taskbar to go back in an app, or to open an app that you were using before.

question6.title: Get to know Cortona, your personal assistant
question6.description:
Get to know Cortana, your personal assistant

What is Cortana?

Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.

The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.

To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)

If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.

  1. Home 2. Notebook 3. Settings 4. Feedback

Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

  • Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
  • Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
  • Send emails and texts.
  • Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
  • Create and manage lists.
  • Chit chat and play games.
  • Find facts, files, places, and info.
  • Open any app on your system.

Try this: Set a reminder

One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.

For example, type or say, 'Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.'

The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.

Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

Hey Cortana?

Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say 'Hey Cortana.' Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home. Then select Settings and turn on Let Cortana respond to 'Hey Cortana.'

Note

Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.
question6.para1: Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.
question6.para2: The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.
question6.para3: To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone  and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)
question6.para4: If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.
question6.para6: Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

bulletset1.span1: Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
bulletset1.span2: Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
bulletset1.span4: Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
bulletset1.span7: Find facts, files, places, and info.
bulletset1.span8: Open any app on your system.

question6.para7: One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.
question6.para8: For example, type or say, “Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.”
question6.para9: The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.
question6.para10: Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

para11.span1: Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say “Hey Cortana.” Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home.

question6.para13: Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.

welcometutorial.description: Vantage vam omogućava da jednostavno ažurirate upravljačke programe, pokrenete dijagnostiku, zatražite podršku i saznate više o svom uređaju.Brzo prilagodite svoje iskustvo i pronađite korisne informacije prilagođene vašim potrebama
welcometutorial.bullets1: Pogledajte status sustava pomoću nadzorne ploče Vantage.
welcometutorial.bullets2: Savetnik za bezbednost olakšava upravljanje bezbednošću
welcometutorial.bullets3: Automatsko ažuriranje održava uređaj u najboljoj formi
welcometutorial.privacytitle: Dozvolite nam anonimno prikupljanje podataka o statistici korišćenja kako bismo poboljšali kvalitet aplikacije.

settings.settingsDescription: Na stranici „Postavke željenih opcija“, možete da odaberete da uključite/isključite obaveštenja porukama na osnovu kategorija Vantage poruka. Imajte u vidu da, čak i ako su sve kategorije poruka onemogućene, možete i dalje povremeno dobijati sistemske kritične poruke od aplikacije Vantage kada je to neophodno.
settings.appFeaturesDescription: Poruke koje se odnose na aplikaciju System Update, članke i druge značajne funkcije.
settings.marketingDescription: Promotivne poruke uključujući Lenovo posebne ponude.
settings.actionTriggeredDescription: Poruke koje je pokrenuo korisnik izborom postavki poput automatskog instaliranja kritičnih/preporučenih ispravki.
settings.usageStatisticsDescription: Pošaljite anonimne podatke o statistici korišćenja kompaniji Lenovo.
settings.settingsNotes: korisnici moraju ponovo pokrenu sistem da sve postavke na ovoj stranici stupile na snagu.
